title: PMS 2.0 446 - The Match Recap, Euro Semis Preview, Peter Schrager, & AQ Shipley
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about The Match and how Tom Brady continues to exhibit how likable he is, Aaron Rodgers winning the day with his golf play and one liners, how great of an event it is, and they look ahead to the Euros Semis and whether or not it's coming home for England. Joining the program is co-host of Good Morning Football, NFL Insider on FOX, and co-host of The Flying Coach podcast with Sean McVay, Peter Schrager to chat about his most recent episode of Flying Coach featuring Kyle Shanahan, what some of his big takeaways were, his thoughts on the Match, if he thinks Good Morning Football is going to be a show that lasts forever, and much more (24:27-49:00). Later, 12 year NFL veteran at Center, and now OL Coach with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, co-host of That's Hockey Talk, AQ Shipley joins the program to chat about what makes Tom Brady different, what kind of coach he's going to be, if any relationships have changed since he retired, and if he's abandoned his duties as a co-host of That's Hockey Talk (1:04:26-1:29:16). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
